[i]Great Blade[/i] – Whenever Chulainn deals damage to another creature, if excess damage would be dealt to that creature, he deals that much damage to each opponent instead.
[i]Luna[/i] – Whenever Chulainn attacks, target defending creature gets -0/-2 until end of turn.
[i]Gladiator[/i] – {T}: Chulainn fights target creature you don't control. If he wins, create a Treasure token.
